settings.name: ClamiSaleList
settings.select: B.SPDCode as F_ClaimCode,A.F_OldPartsCode,C.F_ClaimTime, A.F_OldReturnTime,B.P_PartCode,B.P_PartName,B.F_ClaimPrice,B.F_Number, B.F_ClaimOrNot,dbo.f_Getcodename('检验状态',B.F_ClaimOrNot) as CheckedName
settings.from: [dbo].[F_C_OldPartsReturn] as A inner join [dbo].[F_C_OldPartsReturnList] as B on A.F_PKId = B.F_Mid inner join F_C_Claim as C on B.SPDCode=C.F_ClaimCode

settings.name: GridSaleList
settings.from: F_C_OldPartsAppealList A inner join F_C_Claim as B on A.F_ClaimCode=B.F_ClaimCode

settings.name: GridOldReturnAppealList
settings.select: F_PKId,dbo.f_Getcodename('运费索赔单状态',F_Status) as F_Status,F_OldPartsAppealCode,F_OldPartsAppealTime, (select COUNT(*) FROM F_C_OldPartsAppealList where F_Mid=A.F_PKId) as F_Number,(select SUM(F_ClaimPrice) FROM F_C_OldPartsAppealList where F_Mid=A.F_PKId) AS ClaimPrice, F_InputTime,F_InputName
